nzane.title: NZ Alerts & Events
nzane.subtitle: A mobile app that consolidates New Zealand's alerts and social events into a single platform, providing real-time updates and notifications.

whispers.title: Whispers
whispers.subtitle: A mobile app for location-based messages, allowing for community voting. Based on the the Dark Souls game series message system.

runefire.title: Runefire
runefire.subtitle: A computer and mobile roguelike-game, inspired by games like Hades and Vampire Survivors.
